name: 2048 Search & Friends
description:
Search your favourite stars/movies, or use you Facebook/Twitter friends as 2048 cards!

3 ways to customise your 2048:
- Search your favourite stars or anything and play!
- Log on and pick your favourite friends
- Use images comes with the game

How to play:
Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same number/friend touch, they merge into one.

Get to the 2048 card, and reach a high score!

Official twitter: @2048Friends
Official Sina Weibo: @2048个小伙伴
